H1.text: how old was sasuke when his clan died. 10

H3.text: how old was sasuke when his clan died. seven

A4.text: He, at the age of seven, survived the massacre of his clan perpetrated by his older brother, Itachi, who spared Sasuke's life because he did not consider him worth killing.
